googleBound.secret.key.memo: The key is used to retrieve the Google authenticator when the phone is replaced or lost. Please make sure to backup and save the above key before binding.

baseInfo.title: Basic Information.
baseInfo.memo: For the security of your assets, please verify your identity before any other actions. Please be noted that your information cannot be changed after the verification. Please provide complete and accurate information.
baseInfo.name: Name

uploadID.title: Upload ID.
uploadID.memo: Please upload the below items in the format of jpg / jpeg / png and make sure that the photo is clear and complete. The file size cannot exceed 3MB.
